languages.text: "Гнут спину днями напролет во славу флагмана. В перерывах пытаются не сдохнуть с голоду или от рук совсем очумевших блюстителей, пустотной проказы, пожаров, потопов, гадостных испарений..." {n}Бригадир загибает палец за пальцем, коих у него, впрочем, меньше, чем положено от природы.{/n} "В общем, жизнь сносная. Трудишься — выживаешь. Тунеядствуешь... тоже выживаешь, если котелок варит. Ну и если Бог-Император позволит".

"They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."
languages.original_text: "Гнут спину днями напролет во славу флагмана. В перерывах пытаются не сдохнуть с голоду или от рук совсем очумевших блюстителей, пустотной проказы, пожаров, потопов, гадостных испарений..." {n}Бригадир загибает палец за пальцем, коих у него, впрочем, меньше, чем положено от природы.{/n} "В общем, жизнь сносная. Трудишься — выживаешь. Тунеядствуешь... тоже выживаешь, если котелок варит. Ну и если Бог-Император позволит".

traits.locale_text: "They toil away day in and day out for the glory of the flagship. The rest of the time, they try to survive in the face of hunger, the more deranged of enforcers, void pox, fires, floods, foul fumes..." {n}The Foreman is ticking off his fingers, of which he has fewer than nature's average.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. You work, you survive. You freeload, you... survive as well if you're a smart one. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

"They toil away day in and day out for the glory of the flagship. You work, you survive. You freeload, you... survive as well if you're a smart one. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

"They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

languages.text: «Se esmeran día tras día por la gloria de la nave. El resto del tiempo, hacen lo que pueden para sobrevivir a pesar del hambre, los guardias más brutales, la lepra del vacío, los incendios, las inundaciones, los gases tóxicos...». {n}El Capataz cuenta estos peligros con los dedos, aunque le quedan menos de los que le otorgó la naturaleza originalmente.{/n} «En resumidas cuentas, es una vida decente. Los que trabajan, sobreviven. Los gandules... también sobreviven, si son listos. Y si el Dios Emperador quiere, claro».
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

traits.locale_text: «Se esmeran día tras día por la gloria de la nave. El resto del tiempo, hacen lo que pueden para sobrevivir a pesar del hambre, los guardias más brutales, la lepra del vacío, los incendios, las inundaciones, los gases tóxicos...». {n}El Capataz cuenta estos peligros con los dedos, aunque le quedan menos de los que le otorgó la naturaleza originalmente.{/n} «En resumidas cuentas, es una vida decente. Los que trabajan, sobreviven. Los gandules... también sobreviven, si son listos. Y si el Dios Emperador quiere, claro».

languages.text: 「連中は船の栄光のために、毎日毎日労働に励んでいるんだ。それ以外の時間は、生き残るために最善を尽くしている。飢えや狂ったエンフォーサーども、ヴォイド感染症、火事、洪水、有毒ガスなんかからな…」{n}作業長は指を曲げつつ数え上げる。しかしその指は、自然の平均よりも少ない。{/n}「一言でいえば、十分まともな生活だ。働けば生き残れる。たかり屋だろうが…知恵があれば、生き残れる。まあ、神帝陛下の思し召しがあれば、だがな」
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

traits.locale_text: 「連中は船の栄光のために、毎日毎日労働に励んでいるんだ。それ以外の時間は、生き残るために最善を尽くしている。飢えや狂ったエンフォーサーども、ヴォイド感染症、火事、洪水、有毒ガスなんかからな…」{n}作業長は指を曲げつつ数え上げる。しかしその指は、自然の平均よりも少ない。{/n}「一言でいえば、十分まともな生活だ。働けば生き残れる。たかり屋だろうが…知恵があれば、生き残れる。まあ、神帝陛下の思し召しがあれば、だがな」

languages.text: “他们为了这艘船的荣耀，日以继夜地贫民工作。不工作的时候，他们要竭尽全力地生存下去，要面对饥饿的威胁、疯狂的执法者、虚空麻风病、火灾、洪水、有毒的烟雾……”{n}工头伸着手指数着，他的手指有好几根不见了。{/n}“总而言之，这样的生活还是挺体面的。只要你努力工作，就能活下来。如果你打算不劳而获，你……呃，只要你够机灵的话，你也一样能活下来。好吧，假如神皇就是这么希望的话。”
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

traits.locale_text: “他们为了这艘船的荣耀，日以继夜地贫民工作。不工作的时候，他们要竭尽全力地生存下去，要面对饥饿的威胁、疯狂的执法者、虚空麻风病、火灾、洪水、有毒的烟雾……”{n}工头伸着手指数着，他的手指有好几根不见了。{/n}“总而言之，这样的生活还是挺体面的。只要你努力工作，就能活下来。如果你打算不劳而获，你……呃，只要你够机灵的话，你也一样能活下来。好吧，假如神皇就是这么希望的话。”

languages.text: "Sie schuften tagein, tagaus für den Ruhm des Schiffs. Den Rest der Zeit versuchen sie einfach, zu überleben, angesichts von Hunger, gestörten Enforcers, der Leerenlepra, Bränden, Überflutungen, giftigen Dämpfen ..." {n}Der Vorarbeiter zählt das alles an den Fingern ab, obgleich er davon weniger hat als von der Natur vorgesehen.{/n} "Mit einem Wort, das Leben ist durchaus erträglich. Wer arbeitet, überlebt auch. Und wer schmarotzt, der ... überlebt auch, wenn er es klug anstellt. Und wenn es dem Gottimperator so gefällt."
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

traits.locale_text: "Sie schuften tagein, tagaus für den Ruhm des Schiffs. Den Rest der Zeit versuchen sie einfach, zu überleben, angesichts von Hunger, gestörten Enforcers, der Leerenlepra, Bränden, Überflutungen, giftigen Dämpfen ..." {n}Der Vorarbeiter zählt das alles an den Fingern ab, obgleich er davon weniger hat als von der Natur vorgesehen.{/n} "Mit einem Wort, das Leben ist durchaus erträglich. Wer arbeitet, überlebt auch. Und wer schmarotzt, der ... überlebt auch, wenn er es klug anstellt. Und wenn es dem Gottimperator so gefällt."

languages.text: « Ils triment jour et nuit pour la gloire du vaisseau, et le reste du temps, ils doivent essayer de survivre en jonglant entre la famine, les prévôts, la lèpre du vide, les incendies, les inondations, les émanations toxiques et autres joyeusetés, » {n}énumère le contremaître en comptant sur ses doigts, bien qu'il en ait moins que la moyenne.{/n} « En un mot, ils s'en sortent comme ils peuvent. Travailler, ici, c'est survivre. Sinon... c'est aussi possible de survivre, mais faut être malin. Et faut que l'Empereur-Dieu le veuille bien, aussi. »
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."

traits.locale_text: « Ils triment jour et nuit pour la gloire du vaisseau, et le reste du temps, ils doivent essayer de survivre en jonglant entre la famine, les prévôts, la lèpre du vide, les incendies, les inondations, les émanations toxiques et autres joyeusetés, » {n}énumère le contremaître en comptant sur ses doigts, bien qu'il en ait moins que la moyenne.{/n} « En un mot, ils s'en sortent comme ils peuvent. Travailler, ici, c'est survivre. Sinon... c'est aussi possible de survivre, mais faut être malin. Et faut que l'Empereur-Dieu le veuille bien, aussi. »

languages.text: "Geminin ihtişamı için her gün emek veriyorlar. Zamanlarının geri kalanında da ellerinden geldiğince hayatta kalmaya çalışıyorlar. Açlıkla, gittikçe daha da dengesiz hâle gelen infazcılarla, uçsuz cüzzamıyla, yangınlarla, sellerle, zehirli gazlarla yüzleşiyorlar." {n}Ustabaşı, tüm bunları tabiatın bahşettiğinden daha az sayıdaki parmaklarıyla sayarak listeliyor.{/n} "Kısacası yeteri kadar düzgün bir hayat. Çalışırsan hayatta kalırsın. Beleşçilik yaparsan da... Kafan çalışıyorsa yine hayatta kalırsın. Tabii ki bir de Tanrı İmparator isterse."
languages.original_text: "They toil day in and day out for the glory of the ship. The rest of the time, they do their best to survive, faced with hunger, the more deranged of the enforcers, void leprosy, fires, floods, noxious fumes..." {n}The Foreman lists these on his fingers, although he has fewer than nature's average to work with.{/n} "In a word, it's a decent enough life. If you work, you survive. If you freeload, you... also survive, if you're clever. Well, and if the God-Emperor wills it."
